channel.title: What is your Favourite thing to do on Runescape?
channel.description:
This thread is for all of us to post four favourite thing to do on the game.
Mine myself is Clan Wars, Here's a video of the clan im in showing you what its like (No this is not be vidding, But I am in the war)
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NUNOA08CNg0[/youtube]
Post with your favourite thing to do!

item.title: What is your Favourite thing to do on Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

I like getting swarms of people to follow me to my house portal with promises of dropping a santa, then when I go in my house I wait till everyones in then lock the portal and kick everyone out.

I like to tell people I’m giving away 50m, then go to draynor mansion basement and say first to solve gets the prize. While they go nuts, I tele out, world.hop, and repeat.

Read full topic
item.source: What is your Favourite thing to do on Runescape?

item.title: What is your Favourite thing to do on Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

I like skilling. Combat is boring shit, I spend 2 hours at those damn spiders and only get like 20k xp down. I’m not using shitty armor, either. I have 65 defence so I’m using bandos…

Read full topic

item.title: What is your Favourite thing to do on Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

[quote="~icestorm~, post:19, topic:416710"][quote author=Mr Mopar link=topic=518606.msg3770479#msg3770479 date=1317611631]

When I used to play, I loved bossing with a clan at GWD, Dagannoth Kings, etc. Now PvM is a load of shit.

How is it shit?It’s the same.
[/quote]I think he means stuff like Overloads, Chaotics, Nex Gear. It made PvM to easy[/quote]Forgot about those, lol.

Read full topic

[quote=“casey., post:5, topic:416710”]Right now all I bother with is dice hosting.

Anyways, I was in AoA which was the #1 war clan last year before we broke up. Warring was good fun, and it’d be fun now since I could just use max mage gear /torva/divine and just dominate.[/quote]Were they a Rsb clan? Just last week we took the #1 30v30 and Full out spot from Eb
